title: Stay On The Potter's Wheel
itunes:title: Stay On The Potter's Wheel
description:
Every challenge, offense, delay and person that’s difficult to deal with is an opportunity to be refined and grow in your character. As your character is developed, God can trust you with more influence, responsibility and resources.Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love. To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
